entry.title: 离散元软件学习常用网址
entry.content: 离散元开源软件学习常用学习网址1 Esys-Particle相关链接：https://launchpad.net/https://launchpad.net/esys-particlehttp://esys.geocomp.uq.edu.au/esys-particle_python_doc/current/pythonapi/html/index.htmlhttps://launchpad.net/esys-particle/+announcements 2 yade相关链接 https://yade-dem.org/ 比较 yade的优势比paticle多：计算快，开发团队强大

entry.title: OpenFOAM常用网址
entry.content: openfoam常用学习网址软件地址：官网地址：http://www.openfoam.org/extend版本地址：http://www.extend-project.de/openfoam wiki相关说明，修改信息：http://openfoamwiki.net/index.php/Main_Page 论坛学习：东岳流体：http://www.dyfluid.com/index.html#introopenfoam论坛：http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam/openfoam workshop：http://openfoamworkshop.org/CFD Direct：http://cfd.direct/openfoam/user-guide/ 博客知乎：苏军伟博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/openfoamresearch王洋博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/multiphyzks乐天树的博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_4a0a8b5d0100v2zv.html知乎学习：https://www.zhihu.com/question/27185834?rf=27813194永无止境博客：http://openfoam.blog.sohu.com/entry/#entry哈士奇爱喝酒的博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/articlelist_2696159261_8_1.html邱小平的博客：http://xiaopingqiu.github.io/ 学习资料：JASAK博士论文：https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//powerlab.fsb.hr/ped/kturbo/OpenFOAM/docs/HrvojeJasakPhD.pdfChalmers大学openfoam博士课程：http://www.tfd.chalmers.se/~hani/kurser/OS_CFD/UNIGE Introductory OpenFOAM course-training: http://www.dicat.unige.it/guerrero/OpenFOAM_course2015b.html 其他：101 Things to read when starting with OpenFOAM：http://www.sourceflux.de/blog/101-things-read-starting-openfoam/openfoam history: http://www.openfoam.com/download/openfoam-history.php

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
